Terrorsaur:




Terrorsaur lowered himself closer to the ground. He saluted Stingtra; he was 
rather proud of her work. He put his hands on his hips while looking at her. 
"I'm fine," he said. "I caught some fish by the lake." He turned his 
attention back to Wrath and withdrew his gun. He pointed it at him. "What 
shall we do with him?"
